text: Gu Zisas khothɨgap, ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi gari guman pan, gu kha gava khergiap, ndu Fhe Bakɨme won mbuigi mbik, ndu won tari kov, gu nde ndi mbai. Gu guigira khar nzuai, gu guigira wo ndavar nde nɨɨŋgi. Gu nduara won ndavar nde nɨɨŋgi fhuvara. Kha buni guari kaŋgi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe zam guigira wari won ndavir nde nɨɨŋgi. 1.1Gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, kha gap, ana guigira mbiga guara ndi khergi. Mbe mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, mba mbik ana sios mbe ma, ana mba siosan ki gumgi gu mbigi ma. Ana maaŋ muuŋgi sios thevi, ana phorge rɨgi mbiga hɨrɨɨŋ, ana nzuai kameŋ ves 13 ki. Mba ves, ana bun nzuai, ana vhɨra sios mbe ma.
